review: I have had this firestick now for about 6 months. It was recently updated and mentions that you can take it anywhere with you (hotel/vacation) (as long as you have wifi/internet, obviously) but thats not the case. I have been to NY city for a conference and didnt work in my hotel. I recently just got back from Vegas, stayed @ the bellagio and did not work. Keep in mind both hotels are high class with free wifi from hotel (just need to sign in with their passwrd) The amazon fire stick says its connected (4 bars/excellent) but when you try to view anything , it just tells you not connected and sign in to another network. I had to download a wifi app on my samsung android phone to be connected but that only lasts a couple minutes as well before it crashes. Very frustrating because i wanted to catch up on some game highlights so, Im just getting the word out in case you plan on using it elsewhere besides your home!! Be careful or be warned u mite have issues connecting when staying at a hotel.
author: Tony
